attributes.action: show support for the victims of bike theft in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since 2005 there have been a number of bike thefts, with victims ranging from Mike Joslin a student in Manchester to David Cameron the leader of the opposition.

We the under signed call on the prime minister to show support for all of the victims of such crimes. We ask that the prime minister bail out the bike theft victims by providing such support and counselling as may be necessary, during what can be a traumatic time. And we ask that the prime minister re-iterate his commitment to be ‘tough on bike crime and tough of the causes of bike crime’
